name: You are Blob
description:
(please use the exe download version below if you have a windows PC, for best performance)

Made for Ludum Dare 45: Theme "Start with nothing"

You are a purple blob, floating through space. You can't do anything. 

Until you can. 

Controls (once you unlock them): 

  • Move Left - A
  • Move Right - D
  • Jump - Space

Tools used:

  • Godot 3.1.1
  • paint.net
